alert.note: Alert for Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wilkinson and central Twiggs Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over District Path, or near Jeffersonville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Danville, Allentown, Marion, District Path, Dry Branch, Myricks Mill, Fitzpatrick and Ripley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
